trans-unit.source: This class is intended for use by the infrastructure.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement"></xref> class using the specified target and issuer of the policy, the policy parameters, privacy notice location, and the privacy notice version.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the target of this policy.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Target*> property.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the policy issuer.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Issuer*> property.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the parameters for this element.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.Parameters*> property.
The <xref:System.Uri> where the privacy policy is located.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.PolicyNoticeLink*> property.
The version of the privacy information.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.PolicyNoticeVersion*> property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the issuer is managed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement.IsManagedIssuer*> property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the issuer of the policy is a managed issuer.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the issuer is managed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the policy issuer.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the policy issuer.
Gets a collection of XML elements that represent the parameters for this element.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the parameters for this element.
Gets or sets the URI for the privacy information of this policy.
The <xref:System.Uri> where the privacy policy is located.
Gets or sets the version of the privacy information.
The version of the privacy information.
Gets or sets the target of this policy.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the target of this policy.
